thread.title: Tennis fans meet Simona Halep at Singapore Indoor Stadium
thread.title_full: Tennis fans meet Simona Halep at Singapore Indoor Stadium

author: AsiaOne
title: Tennis fans meet Simona Halep at Singapore Indoor Stadium
text:
Tennis fans meet Simona Halep at Singapore Indoor Stadium Photo: Lagardère Sports Tennis fans meet Simona Halep at Singapore Indoor Stadium AsiaOne | Wednesday, Oct 21, 2015 Shares Shares 10 
20 lucky fans met female tennis player Simona Halep at the Centre Court of the Singapore Indoor Stadium on Wednesday (Oct 21). 
They were selected from a radio competition jointly held by SPH Radio and Lagardère Sports, and went on an exclusive back-of-house tour, which led to a meet-and-greet with the Romanian tennis star. 
Ms Halep, no. 2 in the world singles rankings, is in town to compete in the 2015 BNP Paribas WTA Finals Singapore. 
For more information on the WTA Finals, visit www.WTAFinals.com
